Literature.Title: Systematic study of non-natural short cationic lipopeptides as novel broad-spectrum antimicrobial agents.
Literature.Author: Lohan S, Cameotra SS, Bisht GS

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli MTCC 723(MIC=>100µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa MTCC 2295(MIC=100µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MTCC 3160(MIC=25µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis MTCC 2763(MIC=>100µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-1720(MIC=100µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 51625(MIC=100µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 24433(MIC=>100µg/ml),Aspergillus fumigatus ATCC 42203(MIC=>100µg/ml),Aspergillus niger ATCC 64028(MIC=>100µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC 2344(MIC=>100µg/ml)
